column1: #Text=East Coulee is a small community in the Alberta Badlands region of Alberta , Canada , near the community of Cambria .
#Text=It is part of the Town of Drumheller , which is a hub for dinosaur tourism .
#Text=East Coulee is known for its Atlas Coal Mine .
#Text=East Coulee lies in the Red Deer River valley at an elevation of 675 m ( 2,215 ft ) .
#Text=It was one of the filming locations of the television series MythQuest .
#Text=East Coulee is on Highway 10 , approximately 20 km ( 12 mi ) southeast of Drumheller 's main townsite and 112 km ( 70 mi ) northeast of Calgary .
#Text=Atlas Coal Mine National Historic Site , 110 Century Drive ( 20 minutes SE of Drumheller along Highway 10 ) , ☏ +1 403-822-2220 .
#Text=Climb the last wooden tipple in Canada .
#Text=Learn how coal was sorted , stored , and shipped in this unique processing plant .

#Text=Walk the gantry – a gradual ascent - 125 feet up to the top of the Tipple to learn about the reality young boys faced : that the dangers of the surface were a training ground for the formidable " belly of the beast .
